com.shlomi.golemland.game.Core.Mobs

Class Player.Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shlomi.golemland.game.Core.Mobs.Player.Effect
  • Enclosing class:
    Player

    public class Player.Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    Class effect represent the "Power up" effect with ticks untill effect is gone.
    Author:
    Shlomi

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isOnEffect
      Is on effect?
      int ticksToWearOff

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startEffect()
      Start the effect.
      void stopEffect()
      Stop the effect.
      void tickEffect()
      Each tick decreases the ticks to wear off time, until it reaches 0 or below, then the effect is off.
